definitions.definition: A system for transferring messages from one computer to another, usually through a network.
definitions.example: He sent me his details via email.

definitions.definition: A quantity of messages sent through an email system.
definitions.example: I am searching through my old email.

definitions.definition: A message sent through an email system.
definitions.example: He sent me an email last week to remind me about the meeting.
Don’t send personal messages to my work email.

definitions.definition: To send an email or emails to.
definitions.example: She emailed me last week, asking about the status of the project.

definitions.definition: (may take two objects) To send (something) through email.
definitions.example: He emailed the file out to everyone.

definitions.definition: To send, or compose and send, an email or emails.
definitions.example: Most teenagers seem to spend almost the whole day emailing and surfing the Web.
